title: How can I empty input stream? The fmt.Scanf in a main cannot use more than 2 times, the second will appear to skip a need for input.
body:
How can I empty input stream?

package main

import (
	"fmt"
)

func main() {
	var a int
	var f float32
	var str string

	fmt.Print("Please input : ")
	fmt.Scanf("%d %f %s", &a, &f, &str)
	fmt.Println("Output: ", a, f, str)

	fmt.Println("----------------------------")

	var sIP, sMac string
	fmt.Print("Please input: ")
	fmt.Scanf("%s %s", &sIP, &sMac)

	fmt.Println("Output: ", sIP, sMac)
}
